post.description: Create a new voice AI agent configuration and settings

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of agents for given location.

patch.description: Partially update an existing voice AI agent

get.description: Retrieve detailed configuration and settings for a specific voice AI agent

delete.description: Delete a voice AI agent and all its configurations

get.description: Returns call logs for Voice AI agents scoped to a location. Supports filtering by agent, contact, call type, action types, and date range (interpreted in the provided IANA timezone). Also supports sorting and 1-based pagination.

parameters.name: locationId
parameters.description: Location identifier. Filters results to this location.

parameters.name: agentId
parameters.description: Agent identifier. When provided, returns logs for this agent only.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Start date filter (Unix timestamp). Must be less than endDate. Both startDate and endDate must be provided together.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: End date filter (Unix timestamp). Must be greater than startDate. Both startDate and endDate must be provided together.

parameters.name: actionType
parameters.description: Action type filter for call logs (comma-separated ACTION_TYPE values)

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Field to sort by. Defaults to newest if omitted.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort direction. Applies only when sortBy is provided.

get.description: Returns a call log by callId.

post.description: Create a new action for a voice AI agent. Actions define specific behaviors and capabilities for the agent during calls.

put.description: Update an existing action for a voice AI agent. Modifies the behavior and configuration of an agent action.

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific action by its ID. Returns the action configuration including actionParameters.

delete.description: Delete an existing action from a voice AI agent. This permanently removes the action and its configuration.

parameters.name: agentId
parameters.description: Agent ID the action is attached to

bearer.name: Authorization
bearer.description: Use the Access Token generated with user type as Sub-Account (OR) Private Integration Token of Sub-Account.

Location-Access.name: Authorization
Location-Access.description: Use the Access Token generated with user type as Sub-Account (OR) Private Integration Token of Sub-Account.

Location-Access-Only.name: Authorization
Location-Access-Only.description: Use the Access Token generated with user type as Sub-Account.

Agency-Access.name: Authorization
Agency-Access.description: Use the Access Token generated with user type as Agency (OR) Private Integration Token of Agency.

Agency-Access-Only.name: Authorization
Agency-Access-Only.description: Use the Access Token generated with user type as Agency.

VoiceAILanguage.description: Language code for the agent's speech and understanding. Default: "en-US"

PatienceLevel.description: Tolerance level for caller response delays. Default: "high"

admins.description: Enables post-call notifications to all admin users in the location. Default: true

allUsers.description: Enables post-call notifications to all users in the location. Default: false

contactAssignedUser.description: Enables post-call notifications to the user assigned to the contact. Default: false

specificUsers.description: Array of specific user IDs to receive post-call notifications. Default: []

customEmails.description: Array of custom email addresses to receive post-call notifications. Default: []

startHour.description: Starting hour of the working interval in 24-hour format (0-23)

endHour.description: Ending hour of the working interval in 24-hour format (0-23)

startMinute.description: Starting minute of the working interval (0-59)

endMinute.description: Ending minute of the working interval (0-59)

dayOfTheWeek.description: Day of the week for this working hours configuration (Monday=1 to Sunday=7)

intervals.description: Array of time intervals when the agent is available on this day

enabled.description: Enables language translation for agent conversations. Default: false

language.description: Target language code for translation (e.g., "es" for Spanish, "fr" for French).

locationId.description: Unique identifier for the location where this agent will operate

agentName.description: Display name for the voice AI agent, between 1-40 characters. Default: "My Agent {random 3 digit number}"

businessName.description: Name of the business this agent represents. Default: Uses location name

welcomeMessage.description: Initial greeting spoken when the agent answers calls. Default: Auto generated
welcomeMessage.example: Hello! Thank you for calling Acme Corporation. How can I assist you today?

agentPrompt.description: Custom instructions defining the agent's behavior and personality. Default: Basic prompt generated automatically
agentPrompt.example: You are a helpful customer service representative. Always be polite and professional.

voiceId.description: Identifier for the speech synthesis voice from available voice options. Default: Auto generated

maxCallDuration.description: Maximum call duration in seconds, between 180-900 (3-15 minutes). Default: 300 seconds (5 minutes)

sendUserIdleReminders.description: Enables automatic reminders when callers are silent. Default: true

reminderAfterIdleTimeSeconds.description: Seconds to wait before sending idle reminders, between 1-20. Default: 8 seconds

inboundNumber.description: Phone number for receiving inbound calls to this agent. Default: null

numberPoolId.description: Identifier for the number pool managing phone number allocation. Default: null

callEndWorkflowIds.description: Array of workflow IDs to trigger automatically when calls end. Default: []

sendPostCallNotificationTo.description: Configuration for post-call email notifications to various recipients. Default: []

agentWorkingHours.description: Time intervals defining when the agent accepts calls, organized by day of week. Default: [] (available 24/7)

timezone.description: IANA timezone identifier affecting working hours and scheduling. Default: Location timezone

isAgentAsBackupDisabled.description: Prevents this agent from being used as a fallback option. Default: false (Available as backup agent)

translation.description: Language translation settings including enablement flag and target language code. Rules: (1) translation.enabled can only be true if the agent's language is not en-US; (2) when enabled, translation.language must be either the agent's language or en-US; (3) when enabled, translation.language is required.

contactAssignedUser.description: Send notifications to contact assigned user

locationId.description: Unique identifier for the location where this agent operates

agentName.description: Display name of the voice AI agent

businessName.description: Name of the business this agent represents

welcomeMessage.example: Hello! Thank you for calling. How can I assist you today?

agentPrompt.description: Custom instructions defining the agent's behavior
agentPrompt.example: You are a helpful customer service representative.

inboundNumber.description: Phone number for receiving inbound calls

numberPoolId.description: Identifier for the number pool managing this agent's phone allocation

callEndWorkflowIds.description: Array of workflow IDs triggered automatically when calls end

sendPostCallNotificationTo.description: Current post-call notification settings including recipient configuration

agentWorkingHours.description: Time intervals when the agent accepts calls, organized by day of week

timezone.description: IANA timezone identifier for working hours and scheduling

isAgentAsBackupDisabled.description: Indicates whether this agent is excluded from backup scenarios

actions.description: Raw actions configured for this agent with complete actionParameters structure

triggerPrompt.description: When to trigger this action during the call
triggerPrompt.example: When the caller asks to speak to a manager

transferToType.description: Type of transfer destination (currently only "number" is supported)

transferToValue.description: Phone number to transfer to. Must start with +, include country code, contain only numbers, and be 11-16 characters long (e.g., +12345678901).

triggerMessage.description: Message to tell the caller before transferring
triggerMessage.example: Let me transfer you to a manager right away

hearWhisperMessage.description: Whether to play whisper message to the receiving party

contactFieldId.description: ID of the contact field to be updated with the extracted data

description.description: Description of what data to extract

examples.description: Example values to help Agent understand the expected format. At least one example is required, maximum 5 examples allowed.

overwriteExistingValue.description: Whether to overwrite existing field value if already set, default is false

contactFieldId.description: ID of the contact field to be updated with the extracted data

description.description: Description of what data to extract

examples.description: Example values to help Agent understand the expected format. At least one example is required, maximum 5 examples allowed.

overwriteExistingValue.description: Whether to overwrite existing field value if already set, default is false

triggerMessage.example: Let me start that process for you

triggerPrompt.example: When caller asks for booking confirmation

triggerMessage.example: I'll send you a confirmation text

messageBody.example: Your appointment is confirmed for tomorrow at 2 PM

calendarId.description: Calendar ID to book appointments in

daysOfOfferingDates.description: Number of days ahead to offer booking dates

slotsPerDay.description: Number of available slots per day

authenticationValue.description: Authentication token or API key (required if authenticationRequired is true)

triggerPrompt.description: When to call the custom API

triggerMessage.example: Let me check that order status

selectedPaths.description: Selected response paths to extract from API response. Required: at least 1 value if the method is GET. Should be empty if the method is POST.

triggerPrompt.description: When to query the knowledge base

triggerMessage.example: Let me look that up for you

parameters.description: Additional parameters for the knowledge base query

description.example: When caller asks for booking confirmation
